TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t ɛ l ɚ æ s k t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p i z f aɪ v t ɪ k s s l æ p z ʌ v b l uː tʃ i z æ n d m eɪ b i ɪ s s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ d ɚ b ɑː b v iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n æ k æ n d ɪ b ɡ t f ɹ ɑː f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n k uː p d iː s t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː θ ɹ iː ɹ eɪ b æ ɡ z æ n d v ɪ v ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z ð eɪ æ ð ɪ t ɹ ɛ n ɪ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
